languages.text: {n}Нечто в движениях и лице Назракея кажется вам смутно знакомым... пока вы не понимаете: ту же рваность жестов, ту же судорогу в лице вы уже видели, только стократ сильнее — в исполнении Маражая, иссушенного и сведенного с ума шепотом варпа. Похоже, архонт пробыл в реальном мире слишком долгое время.{/n}

{n}There is something familiar about Nazrakhei's face and movements... until you understand you have seen the same lurching gestures, the same twitching in Marazhai after he withered and was driven insane by the unceasing whispering of the warp. It seems the Archon has spent too long in realspace.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Нечто в движениях и лице Назракея кажется вам смутно знакомым... пока вы не понимаете: ту же рваность жестов, ту же судорогу в лице вы уже видели, только стократ сильнее — в исполнении Маражая, иссушенного и сведенного с ума шепотом варпа. Похоже, архонт пробыл в реальном мире слишком долгое время.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There is something familiar about Nazrakhei's face and movements... until you understand you have seen the same lurching gestures, the same twitching in Marazhai after he withered and was driven insane by the unceasing whispering of the warp. It looks like the Archon spent too much time in the realspace.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

It seems the Archon has spent too long in realspace.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakheis Gesicht und Bewegungen sind dir irgendwie vertraut ... Dir wird klar, dass du dieselben ruckartigen Gesten, dasselbe Zucken in Marazhai gesehen hast, nachdem er durch das unaufhörliche Geflüster des Warps verkümmert und wahnsinnig geworden war. Der Archon hat wohl zu lange im Realraum verbracht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something familiar about Nazrakhei's face and movements... until you understand you have seen the same lurching gestures, the same twitching in Marazhai after he withered and was driven insane by the unceasing whispering of the warp. It seems the Archon has spent too long in realspace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakheis Gesicht und Bewegungen sind dir irgendwie vertraut ... Dir wird klar, dass du dieselben ruckartigen Gesten, dasselbe Zucken in Marazhai gesehen hast, nachdem er durch das unaufhörliche Geflüster des Warps verkümmert und wahnsinnig geworden war. Der Archon hat wohl zu lange im Realraum verbracht.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}纳札骸的面部神情与动作让你感觉有些熟悉……你忽然意识到，你曾在玛拉斋身上看见过同样的僵硬与抽搐。那个时候，他被亚空间传来的嗡嗡声弄得精神错乱。看起来，这位执政官已经在真实世界待了太长时间。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something familiar about Nazrakhei's face and movements... until you understand you have seen the same lurching gestures, the same twitching in Marazhai after he withered and was driven insane by the unceasing whispering of the warp. It seems the Archon has spent too long in realspace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}纳札骸的面部神情与动作让你感觉有些熟悉……你忽然意识到，你曾在玛拉斋身上看见过同样的僵硬与抽搐。那个时候，他被亚空间传来的嗡嗡声弄得精神错乱。看起来，这位执政官已经在真实世界待了太长时间。{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Certains gestes et expressions de Nazrakhei vous paraissent étrangement familiers... Puis vous vous souvenez d'avoir observé les mêmes mouvements erratiques, convulsifs, chez Marazhai, détérioré et rendu fou par le murmure incessant du Warp. Il semble que l'archonte ait trop tardé dans l'espace réel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something familiar about Nazrakhei's face and movements... until you understand you have seen the same lurching gestures, the same twitching in Marazhai after he withered and was driven insane by the unceasing whispering of the warp. It seems the Archon has spent too long in realspace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Certains gestes et expressions de Nazrakhei vous paraissent étrangement familiers... Puis vous vous souvenez d'avoir observé les mêmes mouvements erratiques, convulsifs, chez Marazhai, détérioré et rendu fou par le murmure incessant du Warp. Il semble que l'archonte ait trop tardé dans l'espace réel.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Hay algo familiar en la cara y en los movimientos de Nazrakhei... de pronto comprendes que has visto los mismos gestos erráticos, los mismos tics en Marazhai cuando se marchitó y enloqueció por los susurros incesantes de la disformidad. Parece que el Arconte ha pasado demasiado tiempo en el espacio real.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something familiar about Nazrakhei's face and movements... until you understand you have seen the same lurching gestures, the same twitching in Marazhai after he withered and was driven insane by the unceasing whispering of the warp. It seems the Archon has spent too long in realspace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay algo familiar en la cara y en los movimientos de Nazrakhei... de pronto comprendes que has visto los mismos gestos erráticos, los mismos tics en Marazhai cuando se marchitó y enloqueció por los susurros incesantes de la disformidad. Parece que el Arconte ha pasado demasiado tiempo en el espacio real.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}ナズラクヘイの表情や動きにはどこか見覚えがある…思い起こせば、絶え間ない歪みの囁きによって弱り、正気を失ったマラズハイも、同じようによろめいたり引きつるような動きををしていた。どうやらアーコンもリアルスペースに長く留まりすぎたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something familiar about Nazrakhei's face and movements... until you understand you have seen the same lurching gestures, the same twitching in Marazhai after he withered and was driven insane by the unceasing whispering of the warp. It seems the Archon has spent too long in realspace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ナズラクヘイの表情や動きにはどこか見覚えがある…思い起こせば、絶え間ない歪みの囁きによって弱り、正気を失ったマラズハイも、同じようによろめいたり引きつるような動きををしていた。どうやらアーコンもリアルスペースに長く留まりすぎたようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey

languages.text: {n}Nazrakhei'in yüz ifadesi ve hareketleri tanıdık geliyor. Sonunda anlıyorsun. Ellerindeki sarsıntıların, Marazhai'ın öteboyutun bitmek tükenmek bilmeyen fısıltıları nedeniyle çürüyüp delirdiği zamanki titremelerinin aynısı olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Görünen o ki Arkon, gerçekuzayda çok uzun bir süre kalmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is something familiar about Nazrakhei's face and movements... until you understand you have seen the same lurching gestures, the same twitching in Marazhai after he withered and was driven insane by the unceasing whispering of the warp. It seems the Archon has spent too long in realspace.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazrakhei'in yüzünde ve hareketlerinde tanıdık bir şeyler var. Sonunda anlıyorsun: Ellerindeki sarsıntıların, Marazhai'ın öteboyutun bitmek tükenmek bilmeyen fısıltıları nedeniyle çürüyüp delirdiği zamanki titremelerinin aynısı olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Görünen o ki Arkon gerçekuzayda fazla uzun süre kalmış.{/n}
traits.speaker: Nazrakey
